title: KnoxMeals
description: KnoxMeals utilizes NLP and ML to deliver personalized restaurant recommendations in Knoxville, TN.

title: Overhang
description: A mobile application designed for the climbing community to share their sends, enabling routes to be graded by other climbers.

title: SkyGuide
description: A hands-free, automated drone system that utilizes object detection (YOLOv4) to control the device with asynchronous commands.

title: Patchalysis
description: A hands-free, automated drone system that utilizes object detection (YOLOv4) to control the device with asynchronous commands.

title: Serenaid
description: A mobile application that harnesses Meta's AudioCraft to generate individualized calming sounds to aid in sleeping experience.

title: RiftAI
description: A desktop application that leverages the power of generative AI to offer an in-depth analysis of League of Legends gameplay.

title: TFTComp
description: A cross-platform application that integrates AI with Riot Games' API to provide real-time data on Teamfight Tactics gameplay.
